results.description: Watch highlights as Portsmouth recover from conceding an early goal to beat National League side Harrogate Town 2-1 in their FA Cup first round tie.
results.title: FA Cup: Harrogate Town 1-2 Portsmouth highlights

results.description: Portsmouth battle back to beat National League Harrogate Town in an FA Cup first-round tie that was delayed by 55 minutes because of a power cut.
results.shortTitle: Pompey beat Harrogate after power cut
results.title: Harrogate 1-2 Portsmouth: League One side fight back to win after power cut delays game

results.description: Ronan Curtis smashes home a brilliant strike from long range as Portsmouth battle back to beat National League Harrogate Town in the FA Cup first round.
results.shortTitle: 'An absolute beauty' - Curtis' long-range strike gives Pompey FA Cup win
results.title: FA Cup: Portsmouth's Ronan Curtis gives Portsmouth lead over Harrogate Town

results.description: Relive Portsmouth's FA Cup win at Harrogate after the game is delayed for 55 minutes because of a power cut.
results.title: Relive Portsmouth's FA Cup win at Harrogate

results.description: Sol Campbell's wait for his first point as Southend manager goes on after the League One strugglers slump to defeat at Portsmouth.
results.title: Portsmouth 4-1 Southend United

results.description: Matty Taylor scores a last-minute equaliser to extend high-flying Oxford's unbeaten run to 12 matches as they draw at Portsmouth.
results.title: Portsmouth 1-1 Oxford United

results.description: Bristol Rovers salvage a point as keeper Craig MacGillivray's injury-time own goal robs Portmsouth of an away win.
results.title: Bristol Rovers 2-2 Portsmouth

results.description: Kenny Jackett's Portsmouth win 1-0 at home to Lincoln City with a first-half strike from John Marquis.
results.title: Portsmouth 1-0 Lincoln City

results.description: Non-league Chichester City - the lowest ranked club in the FA Cup - receive a bye to the second round following Bury's removal from the competition.
results.shortTitle: Chichester City receive FA Cup bye
results.title: FA Cup first round draw: Eighth-tier Chichester City receive bye to second round

results.description: Defender Terrell Thomas scores a dramatic late winner as AFC Wimbledon beat Portsmouth to claim a second successive victory.
results.title: AFC Wimbledon 1-0 Portsmouth

results.description: Goalkeeper Jack Bonham is the hero as Gillingham hold Portsmouth and deny the hosts a third league win in a row.
results.title: Portsmouth 0-0 Gillingham

results.description: Ellis Harrison scores with a stoppage-time header as Portsmouth snatch victory at Doncaster in League One.
results.title: Doncaster Rovers 1-2 Portsmouth

results.description: Brett Pitman goes from villain to hero to earn Portsmouth a hard-fought win at home to Bolton and ease the pressure on manager Kenny Jackett.
results.title: Portsmouth 1-0 Bolton Wanderers

results.description: Luna the horse was attacked during the largest football policing operation in Hampshire.
results.shortTitle: Man released after police horse punched
results.title: Police horse punch arrest: Portsmouth man released

results.description: Social media footage shows scuffles between fans and police at the Portsmouth v Southampton derby.
results.shortTitle: Football fan punches horse amid derby disorder
results.title: Portsmouth v Southampton: Horse punched by fan amid disorder

thumbnail.altText: Man punching horse at football match

results.description: The man is filmed hitting the animal before being grabbed by police officers as he tries to escape.
results.shortTitle: Video shows football fan punching police horse
results.title: Portsmouth v Southampton: Horse punched by fan amid derby disorder

results.description: A group of Southampton fans were escorted by officers as they walked to Fratton Park.
results.shortTitle: Saints fans escorted by police ahead of derby
results.title: Saints fans escorted by police ahead of Portsmouth derby

results.description: Southampton boss Ralph Hasenhuttl says he will never forget beating Portsmouth as the Premier League side won 4-0 to reach the Carabao Cup last 16.
results.title: Portsmouth 0-4 Southampton: Saints win unforgettable says Ralph Hasenhuttl

results.description: Police can stop and search fans or ask them to leave the area until the early hours of Wednesday.
results.shortTitle: Police granted search powers at football derby
results.title: Portsmouth v Southampton: Police granted search powers at football derby

thumbnail.altText: Police officer at Fratton on 24 September 2019

results.description: The clubs will face each other in Tuesday's Carabao Cup tie, the first time they have met since 2012.
results.title: Portsmouth v Southampton: Derby gets 'largest' football policing in Hampshire
